channel.title: Inline Hooks :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Okta Inline Hooks Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: Will be hosted in Redocly. This is the overview of the section containing sample JSON content to and from each type of inline hook. Changes to be made: This document is currently dynamically generated, but it should be a written piece fo content that pulls in all the common introduction text from the reference documents underneath it, so those docs can just be reference material rather than having to be an introduction to hooks and then a specific type of hook first.

item.title: Password Import Hook
item.description: Password Import Hook Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: Will be hosted in Redocly. This is a reference doc describing sample payloads and the JSON objects used in the Password Import Hook. Changes to be made: There is some non-reference material at the end of the doc that should be included in the Build section. Note: It is possible this is ported into some Redocly content at some point

Changes to be made: Note: It is possible this is ported into some Redocly content at some point Links to original docs: https://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/registration-hook/ Structure type: Reference Content type: Lookup lists and tables A series of tables or lists where users can look up facts or definitions, interspersed with short explanatory texts that give those tables the correct context.
